name: kline_candlestick_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crypto_markets.
Tool description: Get all crypto markets data live
API description: Fetch Kline/Candlestick data from the RapidAPI crypto markets endpoint for the specified cryptocurrency symbol and interval.

starttime.description: The start time for the data in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to None.

endtime.description: The end time for the data in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to None.

limit.description: The number of data points to retrieve. Defaults to 500 and maximum allowed is 1000.
